title: Mayur Kanti: Diamond Peacock Pendant
materials: Hyderabadi Polish for a lustrous finish.
features: This stunning pendant features a traditional South Indian peacock (Mayur) design, intricately crafted in gold. The central floral motif is surrounded by sparkling diamonds, adding a touch of contemporary elegance. Open setting maximizes the brilliance of each diamond. The intricate filigree work showcases skilled craftsmanship, reflecting the artistry of Hyderabad's jewelers.
occasions: or special family gatherings. Its blend of tradition and modernity also makes it suitable for contemporary events.
description: Embrace the timeless beauty of South Indian heritage with this exquisite pendant. The peacock symbolizes love, prosperity, and good fortune. The high-quality gold and dazzling diamonds ensure lasting value and brilliance. A true heirloom piece that will be cherished for generations. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a unique, long-lasting shine.
